originalText.text: I came to park 5/10  and the Spanish guy very rude and unprofessional am coming to park and paying for parking and he wanted to tow my car coz I park in the parking lot so please replace your team and have professional people working we are coming here to do business in the hospital am not coming to see rude and unprofessional people am paying for parking to park do my business if they have a bad day send them.home or don't let them deal with patients going to there doctor appointments. Go around the corner n will find better parking n no one will be nasty park your car snewhere else

originalText.text: The system can be frustrating, but staff was finely and prompt. As is standard in NYC, the prices are painful. You're better off not driving.

text.text: The system can be frustrating, but staff was finely and prompt. As is standard in NYC, the prices are painful. You're better off not driving.

originalText.text: I don't understand why they say it's the Bellevue Hospital parking lot when it really is an Impark parking lot, which is always very expensive, I've parked in several hospitals' parking lots and although they aren't cheap, they are cheaper than those of external companies , in this one it is the same to do it in the one next door than in the hospital, they should tell the truth and that way you decide where to leave your money
